body.name: Cub Portable Bassinet in Beige, Multi-Use Baby Bassinet with Locking Wheels, Large Storage Basket, Mattress Pad Included, JPMA Certified

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 37 mins
features: IDEAL FOR SMALL SPACES: It occupies a compact footprint making it ideal for small living spaces, when co-sharing your room with baby and nursing. Attached locking wheels allow easy & smooth portability from room to room ensuring LO is always nearby

FUN DESIGN: The playful animal cub design is sure to delight both young and old! Bassinet has a waterproof outside cover and plush, quilted inside for baby’s comfort. Breathable mesh sides ensure ventilation. Choose from 3 fun finishes

MULTI USE: Use it as a gentle rocking cradle to get your baby to fall asleep. You can adjust, fold and remove the canopy, making the Cub ideal for LO to catch naps during the day. Comes with a large storage basket below to keep baby essentials handy
SAFETY FIRST. ALWAYS: The Cub’s lockable wheels ensure added safety. It is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM. Maximum weight limit is 25 lbs
PRODUCT SPECS: The Cub dimensions are 36 L x 18 W x 36 H. It weighs 18.26 lbs. The frame is made of engineered wood. Mattress pad included
body.description: The Cub Portable Bassinet is the perfect first bassinet for your baby. Compact in size, it fits beautifully into small living spaces and is ideal if you are co-sharing your room with baby. It comes with attached locking wheels that allow you to move it easily and smoothly from room to room ensuring your child is always nearby during the early days, especially when you are nursing. Use the Cub as a gentle rocking cradle to get your baby to fall asleep. You can adjust, fold and remove the canopy, making it perfect for LO to catch naps during the day. Comes with a large storage basket below to keep baby essentials handy The animal cub design adds a fun vibe to any room! The bassinet has a waterproof outside cover and plush, quilted inside. The breathable mesh sides ensure adequate ventilation and it comes with a mattress pad. The design frame is built of engineered wood. Available in 3 fun finishes. The Cub’s lockable wheels ensure added safety. It is JPMA certified to meet/exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC/ASTM. Maximum weight limit is 25 lbs. Dimensions: 36L x 18W x 36H; weight 18.26 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bassinet and swing
reviews.reviewText: Our baby boy loves it, perfect for his nap time. It also has a swing which works great for us when he is little fussy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My sister loved it
reviews.reviewText: My sister loved this for her first new born, so easy to cute, easy to assemble and she can move the baby around from room to room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars we enjoyed the bassinet
reviews.reviewText: My little one enjoyed the bassinet but he already outgrow it, I wish they make swinging beds for older babies. He likes to fall asleep swinging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable! Will fit in my trailer
reviews.reviewText: Mostly easy to assemble, most of the problems I had putting this together was because of offices from factory. Once built, it is easy to move. Aesthetically pleasing! Materials seem okay, but doesn’t feel like it’s made to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best portable cradle
reviews.reviewText: Best portable cradle - was easy to install and very happy with the cradle , recommending to my friends and family

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Low quality. Waste of time and money.
reviews.reviewText: We wanted a bassinet that has smooth swing operation, chose this bassinet over other standard ones for swing feature. This turned out to be a really poor quality and is nowhere near to acceptable standards! It started giving chemical odor as soon as we opened the box, was not able to get rid of that odor ever after a few days of keeping it open to air. Installing the parts was a nightmare, bolts are confusing and can make you think all are similar, but it has two different types. Took a long time (3 hrs) and a lot of effort to get this ready. This bassinet is not really built strong, always wobbly. I am awestruck with the low quality, ended up returning it.I buy a lot, but rarely write reviews. I wanted to share my experience to save new parents from choosing this low quality bassinet and save new born from having to feel uncomfortable with this product. My overall experience with this bassinet can be summaries as “extremely poor quality, waste of time and money”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This is such a beautiful product. If you just want your baby to sleep in it, it is perfect. We wanted more like swinging crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es exelente calida y confortable para el bebe
reviews.reviewText: Lo facil de ponerlo en todas partes y lo grande suficiente hasta el año claro con supervision.
